title: When
content:
### When Statements


:::tip
Similar to switch statement
:::

```kotlin
    val x = 3

    when(x){
        in 1.. 2 -> println("X is less than 2")
        in 3.. 19 -> println("X is between 3 and 20")

        else -> {
            println("not in the range")
        }

    }
    
    
    
    
````



````kotlin
    var myString: String = "Panc34eho"

    val valueToPrint = when (myString) {

        "Pancho" -> "Rana"
        "Pepe" -> "Rana2"
        else -> "sope"
    }
    println(valueToPrint)
````
